title: Asep in action: the teacher (TEFC)
brief_description: Contains interviews with teachers on their reactions to A.S.E.P.. They discuss the applicability of A.S.E.P. courses for slow learners through to above average learners. Discusses problems of obtaining the necessary materials and the time required in preparation, followed by demonstrations of the course in classroom situations.
